wdi2-SG.DMK.ALLD.FN.ZS.def: Women participating in the three decisions (own health care, major household purchases, and visiting family) is the percentage of currently married women aged 15-49 who say that they alone or jointly have the final say in all of the three decisions (own health care, large purchases and visits to family, relatives, and friends).
wdi2-SG.DMK.ALLD.FN.ZS.name: Women participating in the three decisions
wdi2-SG.DMK.ALLD.FN.ZS.units: own health care, major household purchases, and visiting family) (% of women age 15-49
